docs.abstract: News Analysis; largely positive view of United States presented by Pres Barack Obama during his final State of the Union address contrasts profoundly with dim view espoused by Republicans; vision that seems more credible to American public will greatly influence 2016 election.

headline.main: State of the Union Speech Is One Half of Nation’s Political Split Screen
